overview:
Credera is a full-service business and technology consulting firm working with Fortune 1,000 companies, medium-sized businesses, government organizations and clients across a broad range of industries. Founded in 1999, Credera is headquartered in Dallas, TX and hosts offices and staffing locations around the country, including Austin, Denver, and Seattle.

Credera’s professional services focus on delivering tangible solutions to clients in three key areas:

  • Management Consulting to develop business-driven IT strategies, improve the performance of a client’s IT organization, design improved business processes, assist with software selection, and provide eCommerce advisory services
  • Technology Solutions that focus on delivering complete and complex solutions from requirements analysis through post-production support
  • Business Intelligence Solutions that enable the transformation of raw data into actionable information to produce measurable results

Specifically, Credera helps clients:

  • Develop multi-year IT strategies and implementation roadmaps complete with business cases and “actionable” implementation plans
  • Transition out, integrate with, leverage legacy systems with proven technologies or develop new applications tailored to the customers’ needs
  • Design, build, and deploy business intelligence solutions that provide decision-makers with the tools necessary to measure business performance

The people of Credera posses a unique combination of deep technical expertise with extensive business backgrounds and have served many influenctial corporations in a variety of industries.

For additional information, visit www.credera.com.
